title: NEVER GIVE UP
itunes:title: NEVER GIVE UP
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Never Give Up! So many take life for granted. Life is beautiful. No matter what you are facing, don't ever give up. Every day is a new day and it is a new opportunity. Don't waste it. Powerful new motivational speech and our latest release with Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity). Music by Arn Andersson (https://bit.ly/ArnAnderssonMusic).

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
